mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board SELECT ROWNUM, DECODE(MOD(ROWNUM,2),1,'10','20'), '제목'||LPAD(ROWNUM,7,0), '내용'||LPAD(ROWNUM,7,0), MOD(ROWNUM,10), 'ADMIN', SYSDATE-ROWNUM/24, 'ADMIN', SYSDATE-ROWNUM/24 + 1 FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <=101
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET div = #{div}, title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, read_cnt = #{readCnt}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_dt = SYSDATE WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT seq, div, title, contents, read_cnt as readCnt, reg_id as regId, TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as regDt, mod_id as modId, TO_CHAR(mod_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as modDt FROM board WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( div, title, contents, read_cnt, reg_id, reg_dt, mod_id, mod_dt ) VALUES ( #{div}, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, #{regId}, sysdate, #{regId}, sysdate )
